label: I-26 Photo 0865
description: Gibson Tire Service / Hawkinson Treads on site affected by the construction of Interstate 26 (I-26). Address: 521 Meeting Street or 523 Meeting Street. Corner of Meeting Street and Lee Street. Surveyor notations on back of photo:  "Dkt.: 10.517.  Property owner: Thomas P. Gibson.  Tract: 59.  Station: 36+50 Rt. & Lt. Southbound Route 17.  Date: May 30, 1963."  [See collection description for explanation of surveyor notations.]
